column4: hello ppl, i really need to know why my computer starts ubuntu so slow, he starts it after 1 minute, ive checked the messages from ubuntu and it sais this, Jul 27 11:48:13 h4ck3rs0nly-desktop kernel: [    9.886531] HDA Intel 0000:00:1b.0: PCI INT A -> GSI 16 (level, low) -> IRQ 16
Jul 27 11:48:13 h4ck3rs0nly-desktop kernel: [   57.886127] lp0: using parport0 (interrupt-driven).
i recommend doing so and taking a look at the log it creates on boot-time, its a very helpfull tool
